Description:
Can AI help you reduce emissions, improve efficiency, and boost operational resilience at the same time?

In this preview of the Turning Insights into Impact with AI episode of Accelerating Sustainability Together, Toby Bowers, Vice President of Commercial Cloud and AI Marketing at Microsoft, and Karlien Vanden Eynde, Director of Product Marketing for Data & AI at Microsoft, share how organizations are turning sustainability insights into measurable business value.

Watch the full episode to learn how AI is advancing sustainability and business performance: https://msft.it/YT-1080183-09042025

#Microsoft #MicrosoftCloud
Title: Turning Insights Into Impact with AI | Accelerating Sustainability Together
Author: Microsoft Cloud
Tags: ESG Compliance and Reporting with AI
